title: Common Questions
description: Enhance your English speaking skills by practicing these common questions. Focus on accurate pronunciation and natural intonation.
instructions: Below is a list of frequently asked English questions.
Your task is to record yourself saying each question.
Aim to pronounce each question as clearly and naturally as possible.
Maintain a steady and conversational pace.
After recording, listen to your playback and compare it to the text.
Pay attention to the intonation, clarity, and fluency of each question.
Repeat the recording as needed to improve your pronunciation and confidence.

scoring.8-10 correct pronunciations: Excellent! Your pronunciation is clear and accurate, showing a strong command of common English questions.
scoring.5-7 correct pronunciations: Good! Your pronunciation is mostly correct. There are minor areas to refine for improved clarity.
scoring.2-4 correct pronunciations: Fair. You can pronounce English questions but need significant improvement in certain areas.
scoring.0-1 correct pronunciations: Needs improvement. Consider more practice or additional resources to enhance your English pronunciation skills.
